title: A Conversation With Ben and Ronnie from Watch What Crappens
description:
We were so fortunate to sit down with Ben and Ronnie from the Bravo-tastic podcast Watch What Crappens!
After we covered the crimes of Jen Shah, we wanted to get the insights of some Real Housewives experts - and nobody knows Bravo better than Ben & Ronnie.
We also talk about who our favorite housewives are, updates on the Housewife and the Hustler Erika Jayne and Tom Girardi, and all our hot takes on Jen Shah's alleged crimes.
You can also check us out on their feed in a bonus episode where we discuss Teddi Mellencamp's MLM scheme and the various lawsuits of PK and Dorit on the Real Housewives of Beverley Hills. Be sure to check out their show - Watch What Crappens - wherever you get your podcasts. Thanks again to Ben and Ronnie for joining us, and we hope you all enjoy our conversation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
We were so fortunate to sit down with Ben and Ronnie from the Bravo-tastic podcast Watch What Crappens!

After we covered the crimes of Jen Shah, we wanted to get the insights of some Real Housewives experts - and nobody knows Bravo better than Ben & Ronnie.

We also talk about who our favorite housewives are, updates on the Housewife and the Hustler Erika Jayne and Tom Girardi, and all our hot takes on Jen Shah's alleged crimes.

You can also check us out on their feed in a bonus episode where we discuss Teddi Mellencamp's MLM scheme and the various lawsuits of PK and Dorit on the Real Housewives of Beverley Hills. Be sure to check out their show - Watch What Crappens - wherever you get your podcasts. Thanks again to Ben and Ronnie for joining us, and we hope you all enjoy our conversation.
